page.title: 09HOMELIFE.A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: Friday 31st May I had shreddies and a slice of toast for breakfast.After breakfast I looked out of the window it was sunny with a little breeze. My family and I went to Middlesbrough, we arrived at 10-45am, our parking ticket said we had to return in 2 hours.We looked at different shops,for an outfit for a wedding.I also wanted to spend my pocket money.I bought a new watch strap, a rope and wood to make a rope ladder.It was my Grandad's birthday so we bought presents for him.When we arrived home there were 2 firemen called Jeff and George, they had been doing the White Rose Wallk and were staying the night. For tea we had chicken, flan, potatoes salad and Chocolate Roulade.After tea Daddy put the rope ladder up the tree. We fed the lambs, then I went to bed.
